title: OCE Preseason Ranked Queue Testing - UPDATED Feb 8th
body:
Hi everyone,

You may recall that in the [2017 Preseason site](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/preseason-2017/ranked) we revealed the new Solo/Duo queue and Ranked Flex coming to ranked and highlighted concerns that our smaller population in OCE may lead to unhealthy matchmaking if both queues ran side by side.

We want to make both queues as available as possible to Oceanic players while ensuring the queues are healthy - meaning high quality matchmaking and optimal queue times.
We also want to offer players the chance to show us what they prefer to play in order to gauge interest in the new ranked queues - before we determine their final configuration for the 2017 season.

**So what's going to happen? We're going to test the queues and adjust their setup as we go.**

-----------------------------

For the first week of pre-season, Solo/Duo Queue will not be enabled in any region.
During this period Ranked Flex will be turned on with 24/7 availability. This queue gives you the ability to queue up as a solo player, or a 2, 3, or 5 player premade group.

This will give as many players as possible the chance to try the queue, while we closely monitor matchmaking quality and queue times.

After one week, Solo/Duo queue is intended to be launched alongside Ranked Flex, with the plan being that it also operates with 24/7 availability. However, depending on how Ranked Flex has been performing and the expected impact that the two Ranked queues will have on each other, both queues may need to be restricted to certain times of day.

We’re aware that Ranked Flex will require some solo players in order to function with 2/3 player premade groups. This means that, in the longer-term, further changes in the configuration of Ranked Flex premade group sizes may need to take place.

If necessary we will move quickly to make changes to the configuration of Ranked Flex, or the hours that either queue is available, to ensure maximum stability and queue health for both queues.
If and when those changes are made we’ll be updating the current status of the queues here.

-----------------------------

**TL;DR**

- We're TESTING the new ranked queues.
- We're turning on Ranked Flex with 24/7 availability at the beginning of the preseason - Nov 9th.
- Globally, Solo/Duo queue will be turned on one week after Ranked Flex, with plans to also enable it 24/7.
- While the queues are active, we will make rapid changes to their configuration and/or available times to ensure that queue health (matchmaking times and quality) is good

------------------------------

**Current Queue Configuration:**

**Ranked Flex:**

* Disabled between: 7:00am - 10:00am AEST
* Allows queueing of Solo players or 2/3/5 player premade groups

**Solo/Duo Queue:**

* Disabled between: 4:00am - 7:00am AEST

**TT Ranked Flex:**

* Enabled Thursdays & Fridays between: 5:00pm - 0:00am AEST

-----------------------------

UPDATE Nov 16th: Solo/Duo Queue has been delayed slightly while we work to ensure there are no issues with the ranked MMR reset as there were with Ranked Flex.

UPDATE Nov 18th: Solo/Duo Queue has been released. Both Solo/Duo and Flex will continue to run for 24/7 while we monitor their queue health.

UPDATE Nov 29th: Starting December 2nd, SR Solo/Duo and Flex queue will be disabled for some hours of the early morning each day. One of the two queues will always be available to play.
Starting Dec 1st, we're testing TT Ranked Flex, replacing TT Normal Blind on Thursdays.
Details [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/5ruA0Wov-scheduled-changes-to-ranked-queues-in-oce).

UPDATE Feb 8th: TT Ranked has expanded to 2 nights but reduced hours per night. See the [announcement ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/oTA7PnYT-upcoming-changes-to-twisted-treeline-ranked-flex)for details.

replies.body: Please launch solo/duo queue already...

> [{quoted}](name=Neeek ,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=aAfOmVeI,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2016-11-17T00:12:10.002+0000)
>
> Please launch solo/duo queue already...

It's gonna be like last season buddy...           
Solo queue wont be coming back for this summer, or any summer to come.
They'll keep pushing it back further and further, increasing the delay time whenever it comes to a planned release date.
Have some faith dude.
To be fair Gehirn, you haven't let us gather much faith from last season.
I have to agree, a lot of riot's decisions are just making me lose faith in them as a company.

in preparation for  the next season etc, inorder to promote sportsman like behaviour how about there be a reward for having 300 of the same token (friendliness, {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} teamwork etc) like a skin/a frame or something exclusively for sportsmanship

> [{quoted}](name=RNG Worlds S6,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=aAfOmVeI,comment-id=00130000,timestamp=2016-11-17T03:56:34.536+0000)

We may not even get soloQ on oce, other servers may get it and we'll be stuck with flex because "our playerbase is too small"
If solo queue is going to be delayed for a week or more can you enable Twisted Treeline flex?

We'll reconsider Twisted Treeline flex when the schedule for SR Ranked Solo/Duo and Flex has settled into something we're confident will be able to last, and a little while after the season has started.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=aAfOmVeI,comment-id=00120000,timestamp=2016-11-16T04:58:31.728+0000)
>
> We'll reconsider Twisted Treeline flex when the schedule for SR Ranked Solo/Duo and Flex has settled into something we're confident will be able to last, and a little while after the season has started.

Wow actually? That's the perfect grounds to actually test flex queue, since it could act as a fresh podium with new MMR. Ranked 3v3's in OCE in general would be awesome.
Finally! - So with flex would be able to queue for ranked 3's as a solo duo or 3 people?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=aAfOmVeI,comment-id=00120000,timestamp=2016-11-16T04:58:31.728+0000)
>
> We'll reconsider Twisted Treeline flex when the schedule for SR Ranked Solo/Duo and Flex has settled into something we're confident will be able to last, and a little while after the season has started.

Please bring 3v3 back to OCE. I have been waiting years for ranked 3v3s on this server as it's much more fun to play while waiting for friends to come online than dealing with 5v5 ranked.

"Our Player Base is too small" Then why not get rid of stupid flex and keep 100% Solo Duo Que? I find myself Solo more then anyone and recently getting put into autofill because being matched up with flex que people is really crap. So i'd say just have Solo/Duo

Solo/duo queue and flex queue are separate, you will not get matched against flex teams in solo/duo nor will you get matched against people who have queued for solo/duo in flex. You get autofilled because not enough people are playing supp/jng, not because of anything happening on the enemy team.

If they keep only one queue chances are it will be flex. Given that League at it's core is a team game, it would be rather absurd to remove the team queue.
Look like solo/duo queue is matched with flex :v like no balance at all and the autofill is too frequently
Are there any plans to enable Flex 3v3 on Oce?
I've heard the whole solo/duoq coming soonTM deal before Mr Red. How do I know you aren't pulling my god damn leg again?

Hey dude, sorry that your trust in us has been made so tenuous. When we thought we could release Solo/Duo alongside Dynamic at the start of this year, we quickly learned that we were wrong and that our announcement was premature. Dynamic queue matchmaking and queue times still needed massive tweaking to optimize them, and we've been making those changes all year.
Now, we're finally at a place where Solo/Duo existing alongside a dynamic style queue (Ranked Flex) is a possibility.

That being said, given our small population in OCE it still might not work out. This is all a test and the outcome is not certain. Either Flex, Solo/Duo, or both will have to be adjusted in their setup depending on which one players choose to play most.

If we weren't going to try it, we wouldn't be trading Dynamic for Flex and removing Normal Draft from other regions. So I'm pretty confident that re-releasing Solo/Duo in some form is the plan.

Hello, i have a quick question, if I have the silver rewards from last seasons dynamic que but i make it to gold using the flex que avalable, will i get this years gold rewards or will i stick with  the silver ones?
Your rewards from this year will always be based on your rank from Dynamic queue at the end of the 2016 season (Nov 8).
Question, will the pre-season flex queue placements affect the 2017 ranked?

Any ranked games you play now will have some effect, but your ranked will be soft reset before the official start of the 2017 season.

For example, lets say you climb to Gold during preseason: when the soft reset happens your rank will be set lower than Gold, but higher than it would have been if you'd not climbed to Gold at all.

You'll still need to play 10 placement games at the start of the 2017 season, which will also affect your starting rank.
Quick question, if I play in flex queue during preseason will this effect me in any way when solo/duo comes out in a week?
Nope. If you play Flex it will not affect your ranking in Solo/Duo.

Hey I just read the how to rank up in the 2017 season article and was a little confused with the statement "You will be placed lower than where you ended the 2016 season". My question is in theory if I have a killer placements and go 10-0 I will still only be placed at silver II (Silver I last season). Also will the preseason ranked change this at all?

It means you'll likely be placed lower than where you ended up at the end of the 2016 season. This is due to the partial reset of everyone's current rank. There is a chance that going 10-0 gets you placed slightly below where you ended up this year but I can't say for sure.

Hi, I am playing a ranked game with the new pre season update patch, and have crashed twice from unknown reasons- I looked at the other lanes for both times, and then my computer was frozen. This has never happened with any of my previous games, so there seems to be something wrong with the new patch? Would I still get put into low priority queue because of this?

Yes, if you continue to play while there are issues with your ability to connect to the game then you are at risk of triggering a low priority queue. Please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to player support to get assistance.
This is cool
Is there a reason why queues aren't up on time as scheduled? Or is there just a bit of a delay sometimes?
The TT Blind Pick queue went up at 15:00 AEST yesterday as scheduled. Was there a particular day you recall it didn't go up on time?

It's regarding SR Solo queue, I may have misunderstood something but I was under the assumption that solo queue is meant to be up at 7 am AEDT, but it wasn't up until 8 am AEDT and it seems to be happening again today, is the delay due to daylight savings? Thanks for the quick reply by the way!

Ah this is my bad as I haven't updated the posts to AEST. Indeed the queue was not up until 0800 AEDT...but we aren't observing AEDT in NSW anymore, so the queue went live at 0700 AEST as planned.

I'll update the posts to specify AEST, and maybe you can take a look at your clock to ensure it is set to AEST and not AEDT :D
When are we getting 24/7 soloq
Probably never, our population can't support it as a healthy queue.

Hey guys my question is.

Will the Oceania severs be given full time Twisted Treeline and ranked for it next season?
i have to play on american servers because i love the map so much.

Full time TT will not be possible without a large increase in the amount of players on OCE. Extending the queue any further right now would drastically increase queue times and lower matchmaking quality.

As for Ranked TT, it is worth a review, but it will depend on how things pan out after Ranked Flex SR and Solo/Duo have their set up solidified.

It feels as if we are getting half of the game TT is my favorite game mode as its quick and loads of fun. its really sad when i get to play it for 2 days then it get taken away from us so soon then have to wait for another week. I believe if you put it up for a vote you would see people voting for it. the queue times as they are, are really quick waiting is not even a problem. not to sound rude or ungrateful but i myself believe the statistics you guys are basing this on are wrong. (just my opinion)

We already have multiple examples of what happens when you put an unpopular queue up 24/7 in a small region, other regions have done it and their queues eventually became empty. (Like classic Teambuilder but worse)

If there aren't enough people queuing up at the same time the queue dies because no one ever finds a match.
After that even if you restrict the queue hours down so that players have to queue up at the same time (which is what we do in OCE) there's a good chance that players will not go back to the queue because they were burned by the previous experience of not being able to find a game at all.

Whenever we expand a queue slightly in OCE we get a few more games being played but almost no increase in the amount of people playing the mode, so queue times go up and match quality goes down as we're just allowing them to spread out the games they would have played anyway over a longer period of time.
hi
GREETINGS
Awesome
Radical

What is going to happen with Flex Queue in the near future? 
Do we have the player base to sustain a second rank queue? At the start of the season I was constantly getting matched with silver and gold players (despite having a D5 solo ranking and P4 flex ranking). This is probably going to get worse after the initial start of season hype dies down and "casual" players stop playing ranked as much.
does flexed rank affect my solo/duo queue rank at all say if I place bronze when in solo/duo I'm gold will it affect my placements next season in solo/duo?
